org.apache.juneau.http

Class BasicHttpEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.entity.AbstractHttpEntity
      • org.apache.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity
        • org.apache.juneau.http.BasicHttpEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpEntity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicHttpResource, SerializedHttpEntity

    public class BasicHttpEntity
extends BasicHttpEntity
    An extension of BasicHttpEntity with additional features. Provides the following features:
    • Default support for various streams and readers.
    • Content from Suppliers.
    • Caching.
    • Fluent setters.
    • Fluent assertions.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.http.entity.AbstractHttpEntity

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicHttpEntity

        public BasicHttpEntity(Object content)
        Creates a new basic entity.
        Parameters:
        content - The content.
        Can be any of the following:
        • InputStream
        • Reader - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        • File
        • CharSequence - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
        • byte[].
        • A Supplier of anything on this list.

    • BasicHttpEntity

      public BasicHttpEntity(Object content,
                       ContentType contentType,
                       ContentEncoding contentEncoding)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      content - The content.
      Can be any of the following:
      • InputStream
      • Reader - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
      • File
      • CharSequence - Converted to UTF-8 bytes.
      • byte[].
      • A Supplier of anything on this list.
    contentType - The content type of the contents.
    Can be null.
    contentEncoding - The content encoding of the contents.
    Can be null.

  • chunked

    public BasicHttpEntity chunked()
    Shortcut for calling AbstractHttpEntity.setChunked(boolean) with true.
    • If the getContentLength() method returns a negative value, the HttpClient code will always use chunked encoding.
    Returns:
    This object (for method chaining).

  • chunked

    public BasicHttpEntity chunked(boolean value)
    Shortcut for calling AbstractHttpEntity.setChunked(boolean).
    • If the getContentLength() method returns a negative value, the HttpClient code will always use chunked encoding.
    Parameters:
    value - The new value for this flag.
    Returns:
    This object (for method chaining).

  • isCacheable

    protected boolean isCacheable(Object o)
    Returns true if the specified object is cachable as a byte array.

    The default implementation returns true for the following types:

    • File
    • InputStream
    • Reader
    Parameters:
    o - The object to check.
    Returns:
    true if the specified object is cachable as a byte array.

  • readBytes

    Parameters:

    Returns:
    The byte array contents.
    Throws:
